verses.name: Numbers 35:15
verses.text: These six cities shall be a refuge, both for the children of Israel, and for the stranger, and for the sojourner among them: that every one that killeth any person unawares may flee thither.

verses.name: Numbers 35:16
verses.text: And if he smite him with an instrument of iron, so that he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.

verses.name: Numbers 35:17
verses.text: And if he smite him with throwing a stone, wherewith he may die, and he die, he is a murderer: the murderer shall surely be put to death.
